name: Public Bus City 3D
description:
Public Bus City 3D is most recent and creative public transport bus game that gives you a chance to be a real bus transport driver to pick and drop passengers. Start your bus drive through astounding and realistic commercial city on a beautiful public transport bus to experience the astonishing traffic bustle.
Features
- Awesome 3D city graphics
- Different camera angles of bus
- Efficient engine, brakes and wheel upgrades
- Four city buses to drive and control
- Extreme bus driving simulation
